A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Despite what some traditionalist's proclaim\, this movie was excellent.  It was nuanced and rich in depth.  Luke was still the whiner who turned into a hero that we can relate to.  I welled up at the symmetry at the end as he stared at the sunset.

Cheers to the bravery of the director who opened up new directions for a franchise that I feared would paint themselves into a corner.

It was a brave and correct choice.
I loved it.
